required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Testosterone Replacement Therapy and Liraglutide Effects on Weight Loss in Hypogonadism.
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Liraglutide and Testosterone Replacement Therapy on Features of Hypogonadism and Weight Loss in Obese Men With Persistent Features of Hypogonadism.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to compare the effects of liraglutide and testosterone replacement therapy on features of hypogonadism and weight loss in obese men with persistent features of hypogonadism after unsuccessful lifestyle measures.

primary_outcome.measure: The main outcome was improvements of symptoms related to hypogonadism
primary_outcome.time_frame: Patients were screened and asked for symptoms at the beginning and every 4 weeks for 16 weeks of the study.

primary_outcome.measure: The main outcome was change testosterone level.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Patient's blood was drawn at the base point and every four weeks during 16 weeks of clinical trial.
primary_outcome.description: Patient's blood was drawn between 8 and 9 a.m. Concentrations of testosterone was measured in nmol/L.

primary_outcome.measure: the main outcome was change in gonadotropin levels.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Patient's blood was drawn at the base point and every four weeks during 16 weeks of clinical trial.

secondary_outcome.measure: The secondary outcome was change in body weight.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Patient's body weight in kilograms were measured at the base point and every four weeks during the 16 weeks of clinical trial.

secondary_outcome.measure: The secondary outcome was change in waist circumference.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Patient's waist circumference was measured at the basepoint and every four weeks during 16 weeks of clinical trial.
secondary_outcome.description: Patient's waist circumference was measured in centimeters.

other_outcome.measure: The other outcomes was changes changes in fasting concentrations of glucose.
other_outcome.time_frame: Patient's fasting blood was drawn at the basepoint and and the end of the 16 weeks of clinical trial.
other_outcome.description: Patient's blood was drawn between 8 and 9 a.m. Concentrations of fasting glucose was measured in mmol/L.

other_outcome.measure: Other outcome was change in fasting concentration of insulin.
other_outcome.time_frame: Patient's fasting blood was drawn at the basepoint and and the end of the 16 weeks of clinical trial.
other_outcome.description: Patient's blood was drawn between 8 and 9 a.m. Fasting concentrations of insulin was measured in mU/L.

other_outcome.measure: Other outcome was change in HOMA IR index for insulin resistance.
other_outcome.time_frame: Patient's fasting blood was drawn at the basepoint and and the end of the 16 weeks of clinical trial.
other_outcome.description: HOMA IR index was calculated as fasting plasma glucose times fasting plasma insulin devided by 22.5

arm_group.description: In the LIRA group liraglutide was initiated at a dose of 1.2 mg injected sc once per day and increased to 3 mg/day after 1 week.
In the ANDRO group testosterone was initiated at a dose of 50 mg in a gel form once daily.

intervention.description: In the liraglutide group liraglutide was initiated at a dose of 1.2 mg injected sc once per day and increased to 3 mg/day after 1 week.
intervention.other_name: Victoza 6 mg/ml solution for injection in pre-filled pen

intervention.description: In the testosterone group Androtop gel 5 grams (50 mg of testosterone) was applied once a day on a dry skin.
